Title: Relates to enacting the New York state bank act; repealer
Summary: Enacts the New York state bank act creating the New York state banking authority and New York state bank to serve New York state residents and businesses currently underserved by banking institutions.
LawCode: Add Art 17 §§250 - 265, amd §99-ii, St Fin L; rpld §16-ee, UDC Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to enacting the New York state bank act; to repeal certain provisions of the New York state urban development corporation act relating thereto; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
